item.title: King speaks in Italian during Rome parliament speech
item.description: The King and Queen will later attend a state dinner on the third day of their state visit to Italy.

item.title: Trump tariffs spark US government debt sell-off
item.description: The cost of borrowing for the US government rose as confidence in the economy waned

item.title: Germany's Merz seals government deal bringing end to months of stalemate
item.description: The conservatives under Friedrich Merz reach a coalition agreement with the Social Democrats to govern Europe's biggest economy.

item.title: Israeli strike on Gaza residential building kills 29, medics say
item.description: The Israeli military says it had struck a "senior Hamas terrorist" in the Shejaiya neighbourhood of Gaza City.

item.title: China retaliates against Trump's 'trade tyranny' with 84% tariffs
item.description: Manufacturers and exporters are scrambling after 104% tariff on China-made goods comes into effect.
